mapper.insert: insert into message(type, receiver_id, title, content) values (#{type}, #{receiverId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update message set `read`=1 where receiver_id = #{userId} and `read` = 0 and is_deleted = 0
update message set `read`=0 where receiver_id = #{userId} and `read` = 1 and is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: select exists(select id from message where receiver_id = #{userId} and `read` = 0 and is_deleted = 0)
